name: Star Defender (itch) (Greenbird2026)
description:
The galactic council is voting in their next leader. A group of aliens does not want this vote to go ahead. Protect the earth!

Controls:

Left Mouse to interact with buttons

Right Mouse to cancel tower placement and sell towers

1,2,3,4 to change time speed

Made by Greenbird2026

Playtested by Pethy

Music by Gabriel Douglas https://pixabay.com/music/electronic-destiny-bond-5344/
